introduction: This part of the section is also editable to whatever text you want it to be. It is usually set to a simple introduction about yourself and setting the scene up for the purpose of this blog.
metadatadescription: A collection of notes and journals written by Jo Yoseph.

blogs.title: Blog1
blogs.description: This is a description of my blog. Each blog will have their own description to lure in audiences and givethem a pretext before entering to read the blogs. This is easily configurable in the config file.
